overview: At twenty one years of age, mountaineer Rex Pemberton, set off to achieve his dream of becoming the youngest Australian to summit Mount Everest. This is an incredible journey of self-discovery and sheer determination, as Rex battles gale force winds, sub-zero temperatures and navigates through apartment sized blocks of shifting ice, in his pursuit to reach the highest point on earth.
tagline: How far would you go to achieve your dream?
title: To Stand Above the Clouds
